sections.text: GENERAL PROVISIONS (§§ 48-7-1 — 48-7-6)Article 2 - IMPOSITION, RATE, AND COMPUTATION; EXEMPTIONS (§§ 48-7-20 — 48-7-42)Article 3 - RETURNS AND FURNISHING OF INFORMATION (§§ 48-7-50 — 48-7-64)Article 4 - PAYMENT: DEFICIENCIES, ASSESSMENT, AND COLLECTION (§§ 48-7-80 — 48-7-86)Article 5 - CURRENT INCOME TAX PAYMENT (§§ 48-7-100 — 48-7-129)Article 6 - ABOLISHMENT OF LOCAL INCOME TAX (§ 48-7-140)Article 7 - SETOFF DEBT COLLECTION (§§ 48-7-160 — 48-7-170)
